com.team3.game.tools

Class CharacterRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team3.game.tools.CharacterRenderer

  • public class CharacterRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    CharacterRenderer is used to render player and npc characters. for each character a new instance should be created.

    Before use make sure to call CharacterRenderer.loadTextures() to statically load all of the textures.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CharacterRenderer.Sprite
      Sprites the CharacterRenderer can draw.
      static class  CharacterRenderer.State
      Possible character animation cycles.

    • Constructor Summary

      CharacterRenderer(CharacterRenderer.Sprite sprite)
      Creates a new Character renderer instance.

      Loads all textures needed by the Character Render should be called before game starts.

      • CharacterRenderer

        public CharacterRenderer(CharacterRenderer.Sprite sprite)
        Creates a new Character renderer instance.

    • Method Detail

      • loadTextures

        public static void loadTextures()
        Loads all textures needed by the Character Render should be called before game starts.

      • update

        public void update(float dt,
                   com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 movement)
        Updates the animation based on time passed and character movement.
        Parameters:
        dt - time in seconds since last update call
        movement - the direction of movement. don't pass velocity but instead acceleration

      • render

        public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position,
                   com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
        Renders the character at the given position using the given SpriteBatch.
        Parameters:
        position - the bottom left of the character
        batch - SpriteBatch to be drawn with, make sure to use SpriteBatch.begin() before hand
